Planning a meeting in Charleston, SC? The events facility boasts 5 distinct spaces and over 4500 sq. ft. of space well suited for groups of up to 300. Outdoor function space is also available, and you're guaranteed a response to your RFP within two hours.

Crowne Plaza is the place to meet! Whether it's an important corporate meeting, social event or wedding, Crowne Plaza offers the perfect combination of Southern Hospitality and dynamic modern amenities. With our Crowne Meetings Director as your personal planner for your event, you take ease in knowing everything is covered.

Skip To main content View prices 
Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr

Important Announcements

Experience Genuine Southern Hospitality at the Crowne Plaza® hotel in North Charleston, ideally located near Boeing, the Charleston International Airport (CHS), Joint Base Charleston, and around the corner from the Convention Center and Performing Arts Center. We offer complimentary shuttle service to the airport and within a 3-mile radius, including the Tanger Outlet Mall. You can also visit historic downtown Charleston, just 10 minutes away.

The Crowne Plaza hotel is convenient to I-26 and I-526, making it easy access to Charleston’s rich history and tours or visits to one of South Carolina’s finest beaches: Folly Beach, Isle of Palms or Sullivan’s Island. Whether putting for par on the world-renowned golf courses in. Charleston or fishing and sailing, unforgettable experiences await every guest.

The Crowne Plaza welcomes you to experience the ambiance of our upscale, modern lobby bar and lounge, offering comfortable conversation areas and a 52" HDTV. Mingle over to our outdoor patio and pool, and be sure to visit our Sweetgrass Restaurant.

Fitness Center & Outdoor Pool

Collaborative Studio

Explore Charleston with your furry friend!

When traveling to Charleston with your pet and needing to find a pet-friendly hotel, feel confident we have you covered! Designated pet friendly rooms & great walking/play areas available. Don't forget to visit our Market Shop for items you may need for your furry friend during your stay! Book our "Pet Getaway Package”! Just a small nightly fee.
Call
 
 +1-843-7444422 Call
 
 +1-843-7444422 
Create an unforgettable family vacation!

Venture out to the World's Largest Inclusive Playground or even stop to visit many of Charleston’s kid friendly educational journeys like the H.L. Hunley Submarine, American LaFrance Fire Museum, The International African American Museum and Children’s Museum of the Lowcountry. You can also enjoy the outdoors at our lovely beaches and waterparks!

Come Together

Crowne Plaza is the place to meet! Whether it's an important corporate meeting, social event or wedding, Crowne Plaza offers the perfect combination of Southern Hospitality and dynamic modern amenities. With our Crowne Meetings Director as your personal planner for your event, you take ease in knowing everything is covered.
Learn More 
Fitness Center & Outdoor Pool

Start your day with an energizing workout in our fitness studio, featuring cardio and training equipment, including a stair stepper, treadmills, and elliptical machines. Take a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool after a day of sightseeing, shopping, or meetings. We make it easy to enjoy work-life balance and flow between work and play.

FAQs for Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr
Does Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr have a pool? 
Yes, Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr has an outdoor pool.
How much is parking at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr? 
Complimentary parking is available at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr for hotel guests.
Can I bring my pet to Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr? 
Pets are welcome at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr. Our Pet Policy: Up to 2 dogs per room. There is a 30 dollar nonrefundable pet fee per night per pet.
Does Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr offer free airport shuttle service? 
Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr offers free shuttle service from Charleston International Airport (CHS). Taxi Limo pickup area.
How far is Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr from the airport? 
Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr is 2 mi from Charleston International Airport (CHS).
Can I cancel my booking at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr have a restaurant on site? 
Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr has 1 restaurant.
When is breakfast at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr? 
On weekends, breakfast is available from 6:30 AM to 11:00 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr? 
Yes, Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr offers a complimentary local area shuttle. Check our for more details.
Transportation page What are the check-in and check-out times for Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr? 
Check-in at Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Crowne Plaza Charleston Airport - Conv Ctr offers free WiFi!

Skip To main content Book now Groups & Events 
From board meetings to conventions, birthdays to wedding days, we create stays and events with the blended traveller in mind.
Email: 1800meeting@ihg.com Call us: 1-800-MEETING REQUEST A QUOTE 
Inventive ways to connect and collaborate

Our Meetings & Events experts ensure are here to understand the purpose of your gathering and deliver the service and spaces to optimize it. Whether coming together for business, leisure, or a blend of both, you can celebrate and collaborate, and create connections, memories, and moments of growth knowing that the individual needs of your guests, and their guests, are taken care of.

Your partner in progress

From boardrooms to ballrooms, on-demand studios to unique outdoor venues, across more than 5 million square feet of versatile spaces worldwide we have the perfect space to suit you. We craft banquets and catering experiences which are customized to your gathering; inspiring connections, collaboration, and well-being. Daily budget debriefs listing out expenses will ensure you stay on target.
